## SyncConfig interface

User configuration for synchronization

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SyncConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [initialNumberOfMonths](./state-sync.syncconfig.initialnumberofmonths.md) | string | The number of months of data that should be fetched on initial synchronization |
|  [refreshTime](./state-sync.syncconfig.refreshtime.md) | number | The interval in which the system synchronizes in seconds |
